text: The 1986 Motorcraft Formula Ford Driver to Europe Series was an Australian motor racing competition open to Formula Ford racing cars.Motorcraft Formula Ford Driver to Europe Series - Round 2, Official Programme, Sandown International Motor Racing Circuit, Sunday, 13 April 1986, page 25 It was the 17th Australian Formula Ford Series and the second to carry the Motorcraft Formula Ford Driver to Europe Series name.National Champions, formulaford.org.au, as archived at web.archive.org The series was won by Warwick Rooklyn driving an Elwyn 003/004.1986 Motorcraft Formula Ford Driver to Europe Series, Australian Motor Racing Year 1986/87, page 320 ==Calendar== Reynard 84FF. The car is pictured in 2015 in its 1986 colors. The series was contested over eight rounds with one race per round.Allen Wise, Motorcraft Formula Ford Driver to Europe Series, Australian Motor Racing Year 1986/87, pages 300-304 {| class="wikitable"
